CPS - Class in Hanabi

monteCarloDynamicAnnealing() - Method in class Hanabi.AI
This is an attempt to a close approximation of monte carlo tree search, what we do is we run a short burst of simulated annealing on the game and attempt to modify our heuristics on the fly, by seeing if we can improve our average in the CURRENT game that we're playing by altering our decision making process.
monteCarloDynamicAnnealing() - Method in class Hanabi.AI
This is an attempt to a close approximation of monte carlo tree search, what we do is we run a short burst of simulated annealing on the game and attempt to modify our heuristics on the fly, by seeing if we can improve our average in the CURRENT game that we're playing by altering our decision making process.
